name: Richman Runner - Make them Run, No dies
name_original: Richman Runner - Make them Run, No dies
description:
Richman Run! You have only one brain, two eyes, and ten fingers. To survive in this funny game, you need them all at time.

Can you survive longer than 10s?

Helping one dude to run and jump over obstacle is easy. Have you got what it takes to control 2 - 5 stickman at the same time?

Richman Run is the hardest game.

FEATURES:
5 funny character for selection
Test your brain hand!
SImple Control
Game Center Support
Social Share Support


Have it and have fun! Thanks.
